item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - blink-182 - ONE MORE TIME... (2023) [HIGHRESAUDIO HRA 24bits/48.0kHz]
item.description:
Album info:
Album-Release: 2023
HRA-Release: 22.10.2023
Label: Columbia
Genre: Rock
Subgenre: Adult Alternative
Artist: blink-182

Tracklist:
01 ANTHEM PART 3
02 DANCE WITH ME
03 FELL IN LOVE
04 TERRIFIED
05 ONE MORE TIME
06 MORE THAN YOU KNOW
07 TURN THIS OFF!
08 WHEN WE WERE YOUNG
09 EDGING
10 YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT YOU'VE GOT
11 BLINK WAVE
12 BAD NEWS
13 HURT (INTERLUDE)
14 TURPENTINE
15 FUCK FACE
16 OTHER SIDE
17 CHILDHOOD

Info for ONE MORE TIME...
ONE MORE TIME... is the highly anticipated new album from blink-182, featuring the group’s iconic lineup together again – Mark Hoppus [bass, vocals], Tom DeLonge [guitar, vocals], and Travis Barker [drums]. The trio recorded ONE MORE TIME... over the course of 2022 and 2023 in the midst of their blockbuster reunion tour, which sold out arenas, amphitheaters, and stadiums across the world. ONE MORE TIME… features 17 new songs that capture the band at the top of their game, layering in themes of tragedy, triumph, and most importantly, brotherhood.

Mark Hoppus, vocals, bass
Tom DeLonge, vocals, guitars
Travis Barker, drums, producer, vocals on "Fuck Face", backing vocals on "One More Time" and "Fell In Love"
Additional musicians:
Kevin Bivona, piano (2, 4–6, 8, 10–14, 16), synthesizers (2–4, 6, 8–11, 13–14, 17), keyboards (1, 9, 16), strings (5), backing vo
cals (10)
